Text:
thanks lord_terabyte.

you always upload great stuff.

I am in your debt, sir

Thank you so much!
WoW!  I have been looking for this forever! I aquired the VHS nearly 2 decades ago and lost it in a move about 10 years ago and have been searching ever since. Amazing.  Thank you lord_terabyte!

this movie is FRICKIN AWESOME!

best bakshi ever
featuring the voice of barry white.. this is genius! big file but i guess that means great quality. I just discovered blaxploitation movies thanks Lord t byte!

AWESOME. I am not sure if I even care about the QUALITY!  In my opinion, FINDING a copy of this era of Ralph Bakshi's animation is priceless. 
 I had a copy and LOST IT along the way. 

Many thanks!
Thank you! I lost my copy of this. The song Scatman Crothers sings in the beginning is priceless.
